instructions: Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Cook pasta according to package directions, then drain.
Meanwhile, in a skillet, saute shallot in olive oil over medium heat until translucent, about 2 minutes.
Next, turn the heat to high and add asparagus and tomatoes. After 2 minutes add spinach and cook for 2 minutes more.
Season wtih salt and pepper and toss with pasta. Top with Parmesan cheese.
node.name: Veggie Penne

instructions: Prepare the beef by trimming fat, and dicing it into one-inch cubes. Toss into the slow cooker, and sprinkle with pepper, salt, garlic powder, and oregano.
Stir to coat the beef cubes. Top with the sliced onion and cook on high for 4-6 hours.
20 minutes before the hearts are ready, bring a pot of water to a boil and cook the rice to the package instructions.
Serve over rice.
node.name: Slow Cooker Beef And Rice

instructions: Add egg yolks, lemon juice, salt, and cayenne to a blender or food processor and pulse until combined.
Slowly drizzle in the butter and continue to run the blender until the sauce thickens.
Bring a large pot with a few inches of water to a slight simmer. Add a dash of vinegar to the pot.
Let eggs poach in not-quite-boiling water for 3 minutes, or until the whites of the eggs are set and the centers are still soft.
Toast the slices of bread. Top bread with sliced avocado, salad mix, poached egg. Spoon hollandaise sauce over and serve.
node.name: Eggs Benedict With Salad And Avocado

instructions: Preheat the oven to 375°F.
In a large skillet, heat the oil over medium heat. Add diced onion and bell pepper. Cook, stirring frequently, for 5 minutes.
Add the garlic, chili powder, cumin, paprika, sugar, salt, and pepper to the veggies. Cook for another minute to toast the spices.
Add the diced tomatoes and stir to combine. Cook for 8 minutes over medium-low heat. Crack all six eggs onto the tomato mixture.
Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven and bake until the eggs are set, about 8 minutes. Remove from the oven and sprinkle with fresh parsley before serving.
ingredientLines: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
node.name: Paleo Garlic Shakshuka

instructions: In a large bowl combine red cherry tomatoes, onion, cucumber, ciabatta bread and basil leaves.
Make dressing with black pepper, olive oil, white wine vinegar and salt, mix until combined.
Add the dressing to the salad and toss gentnly.
node.name: Tuscan Panzanella Salad

instructions: Preheat the oven to 350°F.
Unwrap brie and place in a small, shallow ovenproof dish slightly larger than the brie. Bake for 15 minutes.
Carefully transfer to serving plate. Top with thyme and serve immediately with crackers.
node.name: Baked Brie

instructions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook until al dente according to the package instructions.

Heat a dry skillet over medium heat. Add bacon slices and cook until the fat renders out and the bacon is crispy. Transfer the bacon on to a paper towel to drain the fat and cool, then chop into bits.
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Saute garlic for 30 seconds or so, add tuna and bacon bits and toss to coat everything evenly.
Drain the pasta, reserving 3 tablespoons of the pasta water, and transfer it to the skillet. Stir everything well, add the pasta water and some fresh cracked pepper.
Divide the pasta between two plates, add the grated Parmesan cheese and a drizzle of olive oil. Enjoy.
ingredientLines: 8 oz penne pasta (or any other type)
Fresh cracked black pepper, to taste
node.name: Bacon And Tuna Pasta

instructions: Pour almond or coconut milk into a blender and add chia seeds to allow the chia seeds to soak for 5 minutes.
Add all remaining ingredients and blend until chunks are liquified and the smoothie is the consistency you desire. Pour into large glasses and enjoy.
ingredientLines: 1/2 oz unflavored pea protein powder (or other)
node.name: Kale And Ginger Smoothie

instructions: In a small bowl, whisk together the marinade ingredients of extra virgin olive oil, lemon juice and zest, garlic, oregano, thyme, cumin, pepper and coriander.
Place salmon pieces, zucchini in a large mixing bowl. Season with kosher salt and pepper, and toss briefly.
Now pour the marinade over the salmon and toss again to make sure the salmon is well coated with the marinade. Let the fish marinate for about 15 minutes.
Thread salmon and zucchini through skewers.
Arrange salmon skewers on top and cover the grill. Grill salmon kabobs for 10 minute, covered, or until the fish is opaque throughout, turning once midway through cooking.
node.name: Mediterranean Salmon Kabobs

instructions: Serve the cashews. Enjoy!
node.name: Roasted Cashews

instructions: In small bowl, combine onion and vinegar with 1/4 tsp salt. Let sit 5 minutes.
Cut tomatoes and peaches into wedges and arrange on platter.
Stir oil into onion mixture and spoon over fruit, then sprinkle with basil, feta and cracked black pepper.
node.name: Tomato, Peach, And Basil Salad

instructions: Combine green beans and water in a skillet over medium-high heat. Cover and cook, stirring occasionally, until beans are tender-crisp, 4 to 5 minutes.
Add ginger, garlic, and sesame oil; cook, stirring frequently, until garlic is fragrant and golden brown, 1 to 2 minutes.
Mix soy sauce, rice vinegar, and red pepper flakes together in a small bowl. Pour over beans and cook until sauce thickens enough to coat beans, 3 to 5 minutes.
node.name: Spicy Szechuan Green Beans

instructions: Add all ingredients to blender and blend until you reach the desired consistency.
You can add extra water in case you need would like it thinner.  Less if you prefer your shake thicker.
node.name: Coconut Milk Kefir Shake

instructions: In a large pot, heat the oil over medium heat.
Add the onion and bell pepper and cook until softened.
Add garlic, ginger and curry paste and cook for another minute until fragrant.
Stir in the broth, coconut milk, and fish sauce.
Bring to a boil.
Add the shrimp and rice noodles.
Cook until shrimp is pink and opaque.
Stir in the lime juice and serve immediately, topped with optional garnishes if using.
ingredientLines: 1 lb wild-caught shrimp, peeled and deveined
node.name: Spicy Shrimp Soup With Noodles

instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to the boil. Add the pasta, stir it, and cook it according to the packaging instructions, or until al dente.
Meanwhile, add the prawn to a small bowl. Add 1 tbsp olive oil, garlic, and salt and pepper to taste. Massage the marinade into the prawn.
Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat. Add the prawn and cook 1-2 minutes on each side, or until done.
Drain the pasta and return it back to the pot. Add the remaining olive oil and pesto and mix well to combine it all.
To serve, transfer the pesto pasta to a serving plate, top with crumbled feta cheese and add the shrimp.
ingredientLines: Fresh cracked black pepper, to taste
node.name: Pesto Spaghetti And Shrimp

instructions: Preheat the oven to 425°F.
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper, folding up the edges to keep sauce in.
Combine orange juice, oil, zest, soy sauce, and honey in a bowl. Whisk well.
Pour a few spoonfuls of sauce on the prepared baking pan. Place salmon skin up and pour remaining sauce over it.
Bake for about 5 minutes and carefully flip salmon skin down. Spoon some sauce over the top of the salmon.
Bake for 20 minutes, until salmon, is done.
node.name: Salmon Steak With Orange Sauce

instructions: Stir cream cheese, yogurt, chives, dill and pepper together in a small bowl until well blended.
Spread the mixture evenly on one side of each bread slice. Top 1 slice with cucumber slices, then top with the other bread slice, cream cheese-side down.
Cut the crusts from the sandwich and cut it in half diagonally. Serve immediately.
ingredientLines: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
⅓ cup thinly sliced English cucumber
node.name: Cucumber Sandwich

instructions: Bring a medium saucepan of water to the boil and set aside a bowl of ice-cold water. Put the kale and spinach in the boiling water and cook for 2-3 mins until softened.
Remove with a slotted spoon and lower into the cold water. Drain, then squeeze out the excess water.
Tip the greens into a food processor with the garlic, lemon juice and zest, basil, pine nuts, 1 tbsp parmesan and olive oil, then blitz until smooth. Season lightly.
Cook mushrooms in an oiled pan for 4 to 5 minutes. Then tip the pesto into a saucepan with the mushrooms, cream and stock and bring to the boil.
Tip in the gnocchi and cook for 3-4 mins until cooked through. Scatter over the extra basil leaves and sprinkle the rest of the Parmesan cheese.
node.name: Kale Pesto Gnocchi

instructions: Stir together kefir and oats in a pint-sized mason jar. Stir in vanilla extract and honey, if using, mix well. Refrigerate overnight.
When ready to serve, top with red currants, some more oats, and enjoy.
node.name: Kefir Overnight Oats

instructions: Grill chicken until cooked thoroughly.
Heat bell peppers, jalepeno and onions in pan over medium heat on stove top.
Add rice, chicken, avocado and hot sauce and heat through.
Serve immediately.
ingredientLines: ½ cup avocado, pitted and diced
node.name: Spicy Chicken Rice Bowl
